title: 4 Momentum Stocks To Watch
text:
4 Momentum Stocks To Watch

Harry BoxerStock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 13, 2019 01:22PM ET) By

www.investing.com/analysis/4-momentum-stocks-to-watch-200464563 4 Momentum Stocks To Watch By By Harry Boxer | 1 hour ago (Sep 13, 2019 01:22PM ET)

Follow Stocks in e-gaming, blockchain and other momentum areas are among our top charts to watch today. Activision Blizzard (NASDAQ: ) rose 54 cents to $55.45 on 10.9 million shares Thursday, more than 1 1/2 times its average volume. The move, on an analyst upgrade of the electronic gaming company, popped the stock to as high as $57.52 intraday, above lateral resistance, before it backed off. The stock, which is up from $45 in the last month, may be short-term extended and need to back and fill before making a run at the next target near the gap from last November at around $62. InMode (NASDAQ: ) gained 50 cents to $27.34 Thursday on no news. However, the recent IPO and maker of products for aesthetic medical procedures recently had bullish coverage initiation by several Wall Street firms. The stock is in a bullish wedge formation, and a break through $28 could accelerate it to $32 next. Lattice Semiconductor (NASDAQ: ) jumped 88 cents, or 4.3%, to $21.01 on no news. The stock, which has been in a beautiful rising channel since last November, up nearly four-fold, is now at the highest closing level in 18 years. Recently consolidating in a 6-week sideways channel, the stock looks poised to break its recent intraday high at $21.44 en route to the long-term channel top near $26. Overstock.com (NASDAQ: ) popped $3.96, or 17.4%, to $26.72 on 11.4 million shares, more than double its average volume. The move came on news that tZERO, a keiretsu company of OSTK's blockchain subsidiary, is partnering with entertainment financing company BLOQ FLIX to tokenize films. The stock, which is up from just under $15 in 10 days, broke above its early August high of $26.46. Watch for $32 next. See Harry's video chart analysis on these stocks. No holdings.

4 Momentum Stocks To Watch
description: Stocks Analysis by Harry Boxer covering: Activision Blizzard Inc, Lattice Semiconductor Corporation, Overstockcom Inc, InMode Ltd. Read Harry Boxer's latest article on Investing.com
